title: 2008 Toyota 8FGCU25 4700 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Avery Weigh-Tronix Attachment
item_description:
2008 Toyota 8FGCU25 4700 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift with Avery Weigh-Tronix Attachment

  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 8FGCU25
  • Load Capacity: 4700 LB
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Two Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 18181
  • Truck Weight: 7740 Lb
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 21x7x15
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 16x6x10-1/2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 80‚Äù
  • Engine: Toyota 4Y ECS
  • Propane tank not included.
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Operational: Yes, see video
  • Function test: Pass, see video
    • Driving forward and backward
    • Turning right and left
    • Tilting up and down
    • Shifting right and left
    • Mast traveling up and down.
  • Features:
    • Side Shift
    • Tilt
  • When the side shift is used, the hydraulic hose leaks.
